alert.note: Alert for Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 12 at 1:52AM PST until February 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM PST MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, north winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Owens Valley. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 6 AM this morning to 6 AM PST Monday. For the High Wind Watch, from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds can make driving difficult... especially for motorcycles and high profile vehicles and may create areas of blowing dust or sand. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Damaging winds on Tuesday could blow down trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation.
